channel.title: Brutal Blog
channel.description: Brutal is a theme for Astro

item.title: Have you heard about the Splinternet ?
item.description: It's a growing trend where governments and companies are making their own internet rules, leading to a divided online world. Some countries are even considering disconnecting from the global ...

item.title: Did you know that over 70% of online users
item.description: Did you know that over 70% of online users judge a business based on the design of their website? That's why it's crucial to have a website that not only looks great but also functions smoothly.

item.title: Can Computers Generate Truly Random Numbers?
item.description: Computers are machines that follow rules, so they can only generate numbers that appear random, but are actually generated using mathematical formulas.
